text: The 1953 Drexel Dragons football team represented the Drexel Institute of Technology (renamed Drexel University in 1970) as an independent during the 1953 college football season. Eddie Allen was the team's head coach. ==Schedule== ==Roster== ==References== Drexel Category:Drexel Dragons football seasons Drexel Football
title: 1953 Drexel Dragons football team
